thread.title: Ashleigh Thurston
thread.title_full: Ann Summers Ltd reviewed by Ashleigh Thurston

author: Ashleigh Thurston
title: Ashleigh Thurston
text: No matter what I buy it's always to the best quality and is delivered in no time. The site is easy to use and through out the order process you are kept updated and given all tracking information. I love shopping with Anne summers and the items are always amazing
